data.comment: Today's referee, Victor Wolf, has blown to start the match.
Elfsborg to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Elfsborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Elfsborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
In the minute 4, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Goal! Stefano Vecchia gives Sirius a 0-1 lead in Boras.
That's a fine assist from Axel Bjornstrom.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Elfsborg close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Elfsborg in Boras.
Per Frick is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Sirius at Borås Arena.
Goal! Elias Andersson gives Sirius a 1-2 lead.
Great play from Stefano Vecchia to set up the goal.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the away team in Boras.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Victor Wolf signals a Elfsborg throw-in in Sirius's half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Elfsborg at Borås Arena.
Elfsborg are coming forward and Johan Larsson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sirius have a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In the minute 19, Stefano Vecchia is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In the minute 21, Victor Wolf awards the home team a throw-in.
Elfsborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 23, Stefano Vecchia for Sirius is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Elfsborg.
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 25, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Victor Wolf awards Sirius a goal kick.
Throw-in Sirius.
In the minute 27, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Boras a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yukiya Sugita gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sirius.
In the minute 28, Goal! Axel Bjornstrom extends Sirius's lead to 1-3.
Yukiya Sugita with an assist there.
Free kick Elfsborg.
In the minute 31, Play has been interrupted briefly in Boras to check on Stefano Vecchia, who is grimacing with pain.
Laorent Shabani (Sirius) has replaced the possibly injured Stefano Vecchia.
Elfsborg to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
In the minute 32, In Boras Elfsborg drive forward through Jesper Karlsson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Throw-in for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 34, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Elfsborg in their own half.
Victor Wolf signals a Sirius throw-in in Elfsborg's half.
Sirius push forward at Borås Arena and Nahom Girmai gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Elfsborg defence.
In the minute 36, Victor Wolf signals a throw-in for Sirius, close to Elfsborg's area.
Elfsborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Elfsborg.
Important block from the Sirius defence as Jesper Karlsson fires in a strike for Elfsborg.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sirius's Yukiya Sugita is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Sirius have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
The first-half has come to a close in Boras.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 46, Jimmy Thelin is making the team's second substitution at Borås Arena with Sivert Heltne Nilsen replacing Simon Strand.
Rami Kaib is replacing Robert Gojani for Elfsborg at Borås Arena.
In the minute 47, Can Elfsborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
Throw-in for Elfsborg in the half of Sirius.
Can Elfsborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
In the minute 49, Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Jesper Karlsson keeps the home team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-3.
In the minute 50, Per Frick instrumental with a fine assist.
Victor Wolf awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Elfsborg at Borås Arena.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Victor Wolf signals a Elfsborg throw-in in Sirius's half.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Sirius in the half of Elfsborg.
Ball goes out of play for a Elfsborg goal kick.
In Boras Sirius attack through Yukiya Sugita. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 58, Victor Wolf awards Elfsborg a goal kick.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Elfsborg in their own half.
Free kick for Elfsborg in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 60, At Borås Arena, Mohammed Saeid has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Elfsborg push upfield but Victor Wolf quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 61, Sirius make their second substitution with Hjalmar Ekdal replacing Mohammed Saeid.
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
Elfsborg to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
Throw-in for Sirius at Borås Arena.
In the minute 64, Rasmus Alm grabs a goal to bring things level at 3-3 at Borås Arena.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Leo Vaisanen (Elfsborg) has received a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Elfsborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 70, Throw-in Elfsborg.
Jimmy Thelin (Elfsborg) is making a third substitution, with Gustav Henriksson replacing Joseph Okumu.
Elfsborg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 72, Can Elfsborg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sirius's half?
Throw-in for Elfsborg in the half of Sirius.
Victor Wolf awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 75, Elfsborg needs to be cautious. Sirius have an attacking throw-in.
Elias Andersson of Sirius gets in a strike, but is off target.
Elfsborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Boras.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Sirius.
The home team replace Simon Olsson with Samuel Holmen.
In the minute 85, The home team have replaced Jesper Karlsson with Jacob Ondrejka. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jimmy Thelin.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rasmus Alm (Elfsborg) has received a yellow card from Victor Wolf.
In the minute 87, Throw-in Elfsborg.
Can Sirius get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elfsborg's half?
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 88, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Elfsborg in their own half.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Goal kick for Sirius at Borås Arena.
At Borås Arena the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Elfsborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sirius at Borås Arena.
Sirius needs to be cautious. Elfsborg have an attacking throw-in.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-3.
Adam Stahl is on a sub for Karl Larson for Sirius.
Johan Karlsson is replacing Elias Andersson for the away team.
